audioText: Au fond, cette réforme éducative ne changera rien aux inégalités sociales profondes qui persistent dans notre système scolaire depuis des décennies.
question: What is the speaker's opinion about the educational reform?
options: Fundamentally, it will not change the deep social inequalities in the school system
It will completely revolutionize the educational approach
It will solve all the problems in education within a few years
It focuses too much on superficial changes rather than real issues
explanation: The speaker uses 'Au fond' (fundamentally/basically) to express that the reform won't change deep social inequalities that have persisted for decades in the school system.
